msbt.message: Well, if I'm not mistaken, you've got on the . I thought I recognized it! You look marvelous, ! And I hope you don't mind if I take at least partial credit.
Just look at you! You're wearing the !You look utterly sublime! I'm so glad you wore it, !
Why, I thought I recognized the you're wearing! I see I made the right decision in passing this on to you. You look absolutely fab, !
Well now, I do believe I recognize the you're wearing. I must say, you do accessorize with the panache of a fashion icon, .
Oh! WhyI believe you've got on the .I'm so very pleased! You certainly know how to make the most of a piece like that, .
My, my! Look at you! Wearing my and with such flair, . I hope you love your look as much as I do! It tickles me that I might have introduced you to a new style.
Darling, did you match your with your outfit on purpose? Either way, your look is on point. Well done, you fashionista you!
The you are wearingpositively fabulous!If you don't mind my saying, you seem to have elevated your style to a whole new level, !

, my dear, the you've selected today What can I say? Well, certainly this look you've put together is just so YOU.More importantly, I'm so in love with it, darling, I might just have to make it so ME!
The you have on—simply marvelous, my dear!Good accessories are like stars in the night sky They can light up even the dimmest fashion choices.
Oooh! Just look at you, you budding fashionista. I just LOVE the ! And what an impeccable job you did matching that piece with the rest of your outfit today! Bravo! Bravo!
The you have on—what a sublime accent to your ensemble, .
Love the you've got on, darling.I always enjoy seeing the ensembles you put together, but today's is especially fabulous.

My dear, your ensemble is faboo today, as always. And your chic
Well, I'm glad someone understands that footwear is quite literally the foundation of good fashion!
Why...did you design those clothes yourself?<10_4 /> I'm terribly impressed, ! Such style! Such flair! There isn't a thing you can't do, is there? I do envy you, .
The clothes you're wearing The look is so unique, so bold! Who's your designer? I must know! Oh my! designed the ?Well, well, well. Impressive! You never know where talent lies, !
This outfit of yours, my dear The design is rather singular, isn't it? Tell me, who are you wearing?Ah yes, I should have known! An original design by of . Well, they have my stamp of approval, !
Why, the lovely you're wearingYour whole ensemble, actually, it simply screams SPRING! I believe a picnic is in order, .
Summer styles are simply fabulous! The you have on included, ! As someone who knows a thing or three about fashion, I declare that the chic way to beat the heat!
Well, ! You and your are all ready for fall, aren't you?
Your I approve, .Cozy, yet stylish Warm, yet utterly coolClearly you've got your finger on the pulse of this winter's hottest trends!
Darling, what ARE you thinking? Your outfitjust looking at it is making me sweat! It is summertime! There are fashion DOs and fashion DON'Ts. And thisthis is a fashion YOU MUST BE JOKING.
, darling! Your outfit!You look as if you think frostbite is a flavor of ice cream rather than a good way to lose a pinky! Throw a scarf on, at least!
Your ! Cute is the first word that comes to mindbut ADORABLE is more like it! You look absolutely fabulous, . And I bet you feel absolutely fabulous too!
My word, you look adorable today. You ought to consider wearing your more.And if you're not going to, might you consider making a donation to my own wardrobe? Just a thought.
Why look at you, ! Aren't you the picture of cool!The way you're wearing your You look unstoppable, .
Is it me, or is there something much cooler about you today? Ah! It's your .That's the magic of clothing. It's like a prism that refracts the inner you into a single motif, such as "cool."
You know, the way you're wearing your I'm loving the graceful simplicity. You've clearly mastered an advanced styling technique. And you can bet I'm taking notes, .
I'm getting something from you today that's very simple, almost minimalistAnd I've just realized what it is! It's coming from your subdued .
The you have onwhat an exceptional look!I tell you, when it comes to gorgeous items like this, you don't choose THEMthey choose YOU. And you have certainly been chosen, !
If I didn't know better, I'd think your calling in life was to wear your .Don't laugh—looking immaculate is a vocation, and it's one that I happen to take very seriously, .

Ah yes, I see you're wearing your .Don't you just love wearing activewear? I certainly do. It makes me feel like I could run a marathon! Oh! Don't get me wrong! I have no intention of ACTUALLY running a marathon. That would be silly.

You're looking like a coiled spring in your .I've always said—ask anyone!—that one's clothing ought to serve as a manifestation of one's inner being.In your case, it's as if you've made your inner fire into an outfit, and now you wear it for all to see.
What IS this vibe you're giving off today? This calm eleganceit really suits you, . The you're wearing MUST be the secret. Don't EVER change, .
Do you know what I think, seeing you in your ?I think you and I had better keep our distance, lest our combined elegance blow the minds of everyone here.
Your clothes You really do like them, don't you? To be fair, they DO look quite good on you.
Darling, if you don't mind my saying, it seems like you're always wearing your . Not that your clothes don't suit you. I just wonder if you might want to try another style or two?
My, you DO like to wear your , don't you! Are you crafting a signature style for yourself? Or do you not like thinking about what to wear? I do wonder.
You know, , I've grown accustomed to seeing you in that outfit. It's as though and are an inseparable set, .
We all have that favorite outfit that looks juuust right on us, don't we? Our comfort clothing, you might say. You, my dear, are clearly very fond of your . Go on. Wear it as long as you like.
Why, , don't you look like a colorful candy egg today! I could eat you up. Goodness! Now I have a terrible craving for chocolate! Just look what you've done to me, .

My wedding bells! Your outfit! You're not getting married today, are you, ?! Did I forget an important date? Was an invitation lost in the mail? WHAT AM I GOING TO WEAR?!Ordid you simply dress fabulous for the sake of dressing fabulous?Well, whatever it is you're doing dressed in this ensembleyou're going to look splendid doing it!

Well, well. I'd heard fruit-inspired attire was ALL the rage. One look at your ensemble and I can see why. Darling, I have one word for this look of yours FRESH!In factI think I just might start wearing on my head. As a sort of hat, you know. Oh, you know me, . I simply refuse to miss out on a fresh fashion trend!
Why, aren't you just the cutest little pirate I've ever seen! Arrrgh! Aye! Bilge the mainsail, ! Goodness, I just LOVE piratey stuff. Well, I hope you find the treasure you're looking for, my dear.

Why, look at that A mermaid fresh from the sea! Is it true you can talk to the fish, ? Oh, I'm just being silly, of course. I know you're not a real mermaid, my dear. But, eh, you will let me know if you learn how to speak to fish, won't you?
Why, just look at you! Someone is ready for a dip in the ocean, I see.I'd go for a dip myselfbut I spent far too much time on my makeup to let it just wash away, .
Your outfit! It's spectacular! You know, I hear the ancient-chic look is in style again. Oh, you! Always on the cutting edge of style, .

What can I say? Your outfit for today Classical, regal, elegant.I am especially fond of the sleeves. The way they sway when you walk It's quite mesmerizing.Goodness, I might just have to copy your look. Surely you understand, .
Your outfit today! Such passion! Such flair! I don't think I've seen this side of you, . If you invited me to dance, why, I would simply have no choicebut to dance with you, !
Whatare youwearing, ?Your look! Your bag! They have a couture quality I can't quite place. They are handmade, aren't they?Oh, now I see. They're made in the best way. With love!

Why, look at that! You've got Dodo written all over you! The airline, I mean.Quite the vivid branding, don't you think? You must be a frequent flyer, . Well, I say wear the brands you love with pride. It's nice to be passionate about life.
Darling, your ensemble is just incredible today. It's so gloriously dark. , I love it!You look ready to make a splash at a costume party and then turn heads around town. Well done!

Why, ! You look positively feline today!Surely I was your inspiration. No need to be shy about it—I'm quite used to it, darling. Plus, it's a fabulous look on you. You might even sayit's the cat's meow!

Well, , you look rather feline today, don't you. But why, darling? WHY? I mean, there's nothing wrong with this look, per seIt's just, I wonder if you've considered dressing more like, say? Well, take it into consideration. I'm certain you'd look quite sharp, !
Leaping lily pads! I see you've fully embraced your inner frog, ! Bravo, darling. Bravo! I say let your frog flag fly, !
Why, you're looking like quite the fashionable froggy today, aren't you, ? You know, the amphibious look is very IN right now. One might say you HOPPED on the right trend.

Why, just look at you, !You're sorabbit-esque.I'd better be careful, or folks around here will be turning to you as the authority on rabbit style. Still, I'd be delighted to teach you everything I know about being me!
Well, look who decided to step out in rabbity fashion today.Now, now. I don't mean anything by that. Quite the contrary.If you must knowthose ears are my everything, !
My word! Did you truly dress up as a bear today, ?I think that's wonderful, seeing you embrace us bears like that.You know, maybe now you see what I'm really like on the insidewarm and fuzzy, .

What a look you have going today. Let me take it all in, !Oh, yes. It's all there, isn't it? I see what you're going for. Teddy-bear style.I have to admit, I'm a bit jealous. I wish the warm and fuzzy look worked for me, .

What have we here? Are youlike me? A sheep, ?Sheep-like, anyway. I applaud the bold choice. Here's a tip. We sheep pride ourselves on our fluffiness.I wouldn't say this to just anyone, but feel free to copy my own fluffy styling, !

What's this? Are you actually masquerading as a sheep, ?If so, well done!I can't imagine it done any better. The fluff and flounce is so hard to pull off. I'm not sure I could.I'm glad you have the knack for it. It's really a lot of look to take on, .
Your outfit todaylooks positively powerful, !Dressed like that, you look as if you're in charge of something VERY important, . Are you in charge of something very important? Do tell, darling.
Your look todayVERY professional, . Work chic at its finest. I, for one, wouldn't be surprised if you were the CEO of a billion-Bell business, !

Don't you look ready for takeoff! I once dreamed of becoming a flight attendant myself, you know. How fabulous it would be to fly to all those exotic localesPerhaps we should apply for a job at the island's airport, !

Have you been off skiing? This mountain chic look you have going on is wonderful, . I mean, it doesn't make me want to go skiing or anything like that. Goodness no, darling. Not me. But it does make me want to kick back in a nice warm lodge with a cup of hot cocoa, .
Why, your dress today It is simply magnificent, .Oh! I called you ! My sincerest apologies!What I should have called you is Your Highness, .
You are looking like quite the aristocrat today, !Will you be attending dinner at a castle? Dancing with royalty, perhaps? Goodness! If any of that is true, you MUST tell me, !
My word! I can accept that there's such a thing as spa-inspired fashionbut THIS?I'm not sure what to think, .I'm just embarrassed for one of us, that's all. And I'm not sure who!
You're dressed for ballet today! I have to say, that's sheer elegance.I can see it nowyou, dancing onstage and spinning in pirouettes.I needed that. Thanks, .
Whaaa? Cute baby? Cute baby!Oh, sorry! There's just something about cuteness, and babies are such tiny experts at being cute.I don't know if you were this adorable back then, but you are now, Baby !

Wearing that outfit again, are we? Oh! Terribly sorry! I did NOT mean to sound judgy! I was simply trying to say that I admire the way you stick with a look that's working for you. No need to trifle with perfection, !

Looking fabulous in that outfit again today, I see.You know, some folks feel the need to change up their look all the time. And good for them, I say. But do you know what else I say? I say it's OK to stick with familiar favorites if that's your thing, darling. Fashion is there to serve YOU, my dear. You are not there to serve it.Goodness, that was clever, wasn't it? I better go write it down before I forget it, !

Hmm. Yes, that outfit might be your best look after all.And I appreciate the way you're really sticking with it, .You're not the sort to switch from one fashion to another willy-nilly. You are committed, !
What is differentabout your face?I love it! Well done, .

You're going for a new look with your face today.Good! Personal style isn't merely a matter of taste. It's about one's mood too.I just have to wonderwhat is your mood today? Such a riveting mystery, .
My word! You're doing something new with your face.I can see that being just the right touch for a special occasion!
